TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IXamlTypeResolver

summary.span: 表示一种服务，该服务将 XAML 标记中的已命名元素解析为适当的 CLR 类型。

span.span: Represents a service that resolves from named elements in XAML markup to the appropriate CLR type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类主要由和作为服务的作者来确定所需的构造 CLR 对象的 XAML 到 CLR 类型映射。The class is used primarily by and authors as a service to determine the XAML-to-CLR type mapping that is necessary for constructing a CLR object. 类型转换器和标记扩展可以查询有关作为上由 XAML 对象编写器，XAML 对象编写器调用值转换行为时提供的服务上下文的服务。Type converters and markup extensions can query for as a service on the service context that is provided by a XAML object writer, when the XAML object writer invokes value conversion behavior. 有关详细信息，请参阅[类型转换器和 XAML 的标记扩展](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/type-converters-and-markup-extensions-for-xaml.md)和[可供类型转换器和标记扩展的上下文服务](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/service-contexts-available-to-type-converters-and-markup-extensions.md)。For more information, see [Type Converters and Markup Extensions for XAML](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/type-converters-and-markup-extensions-for-xaml.md) and [Service Contexts Available to Type Converters and Markup Extensions](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/service-contexts-available-to-type-converters-and-markup-extensions.md). 在以前版本的.NET Framework 中，此接口存在于 WindowsBase 的特定于 WPF 程序集。In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this interface existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase. 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，位于 System.Xaml 程序集中。In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], is in the System.Xaml assembly. 有关详细信息，请参阅[类型从 WPF 迁移到 System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md)。For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Type Resolve(string qualifiedTypeName) cil managed
Public Function Resolve (qualifiedTypeName As String) As Type

param.name: qualifiedTypeName
param.span: 要解析的 XAML 类型名称。

span.span: The XAML type name to resolve.

param.span: 该类型名称可以由 XML 命名空间的前缀限定。

span.span: The type name is optionally qualified by the prefix for a XML namespace.

param.span: 否则将采用当前默认的 XML 命名空间。

span.span: Otherwise the current default XML namespace is assumed.

summary.span: 将已命名的 XAML 类型解析为相应的 CLR 。

span.span: Resolves a named XAML type to the corresponding CLR .
